attributes.action: consider drivers of cars purchased after 23.03.06 and who have already paid the unfair and unjust retrospective vehicle excise duty and to treat them in the same manner as other road users if or when this levy is rescinded and repay the amount overcharged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some cars purchased after 23.03.06 found their Vehicle Duty doubled after the announcement in the Budget on 12.03.08 and are now paying the new amount.  Cars purchased before that date eg 22.03.06 are still paying the original lower figure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
